name: Angkôrvôtt
uniques: Comment [Provides 1 of all Great People Points]
quote: 'All beings who are plunged into the ocean of existence, may I draw them out by virtue of this good work.' - Jayavarman VII, To Prohm

name: Byrsa
uniques: Gain a free [Walls] [in all coastal cities]
[+50]% Gold from Great Merchant trade missions
quote: 'There are to be seen at this day certain ruins of the city walls.' - Leo Africanus

name: Colosseo
quote: 'While stands the Colosseum, Rome shall stand. When falls the Colosseum, Rome shall fall, and when Rome falls, with it shall fall the world' - The Venerable Bede

name: Kolossòs Rhódios
quote: 'He doth bestride the narrow world, and we petty men walk under his huge legs, and peep about to find ourselves dishonorable graves.' - William Shakespeare

name: Dur-Sharrukin
uniques: [Military] Units adjacent to this city heal [5] HP per turn when healing
quote: 'From this day forward, your pronouncement shall be unchangeable, to raise or bring low - these shall be in your hand.' - Enūma Eliš

name: Emile Bell
uniques: [+25]% [Food] [in all cities] <for [7] turns> <upon declaring friendship> <(modified by game speed)>
[+20]% growth [in all cities] <for [7] turns> <upon declaring friendship> <(modified by game speed)>
quote: 'In the midst of the snow, the light of Goreyo hovers; An icy temple bell resounds echoes of the old kingdom.' - Hwang Jini

name: Gate of All Nations
uniques: Empire enters a [7]-turn Golden Age <upon declaring war on [Major] Civilizations> <(modified by game speed)>
Empire enters a [7]-turn Golden Age <upon being declared war on by [Major] Civilizations> <(modified by game speed)>
quote: 'No man is foolish enough to desire War over peace: for in peace sons bury fathers, but in War fathers bury sons.' - Croesus of Lydia

name: Library of Alexandria
quote: 'The place for the cure of the soul.' - Inscription over the door at the library

name: Lighthouse of Alexandria
uniques: Land units may cross [Ocean] tiles after the first [Great Merchant] is earned
quote: 'He built the tower at Pharos, the greatest and most beautiful work of all, so that a light might shine for sailors far across the sea.' - Lucian of Samosata

name: Great Stele
uniques: Gain [200] [Gold] <upon constructing [Wonder] [in all cities]> <(modified by game speed)> <hidden from users>
Gain [200] [Gold] <upon constructing [Wonder] [in all cities]> <(modified by game speed)> <starting from the [Medieval era]> <hidden from users>
Gain [200] [Gold] <upon constructing [Wonder] [in all cities]> <(modified by game speed)> <starting from the [Industrial era]> <hidden from users>
Gain [200] [Gold] <upon constructing [Wonder] [in all cities]> <(modified by game speed)> <starting from the [Atomic era]> <hidden from users>
Comment [Gain 200 [Gold] upon constructing a Wonder in all cities, increasing by 200 [Gold] every 2 eras (modified by game speed)]
quote: 'May the might of the Lord cause no enemy to resist me, no enemy to follow me.' - Aksumite Inscription

name: Ha'amonga 'a Maui
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Culture] from [Fishing boats] tiles [in this city]
quote: 'I am the River, the River is me.' - Whanganui saying

name: Hanging Gardens of Sennacherib
quote: 'The canal-water gushes from above into the gardens; fragrance pervades the walkways, streams of water as numerous as the stars of heaven flow in the pleasure garden.' - Ashurbanipal

name: Mausoleum at Halicarnassus
uniques: All newly-trained [Chariot Archer] units [in all cities] receive the [Artemisia I] promotion
All newly-trained [Horseman] units [in all cities] receive the [Artemisia II] promotion
All newly-trained [Knight] units [in all cities] receive the [Artemisia III] promotion
All newly-trained [Lancer] units [in all cities] receive the [Artemisia IV] promotion
All newly-trained [Cavalry] units [in all cities] receive the [Artemisia V] promotion
All newly-trained [Landship] units [in all cities] receive the [Artemisia VI] promotion
All newly-trained [Tank] units [in all cities] receive the [Artemisia VII] promotion
All newly-trained [Modern Armor] units [in all cities] receive the [Artemisia VIII] promotion
Comment [The first time a Mounted or Armoured unit is destroyed, it will respawn at your capital.]
quote: 'A vast tomb lies over me in Halicarnassus, of such dimensions, of such exquisite beauty as no other shade can boast.' - Lucian of Samosata

name: Mausoleum of Theodoric
quote: 'Better it is for every man to avenge his friend than mourn him.' - Beowulf

name: Monks Mound
uniques: Creates a [Great Mound] improvement on a specific tile
quote: 'And here he lay, older than the hill he rested on.' - Zitkala-Sa

name: Mundo Perdido
uniques: [+2 Happiness] [in all cities] <within [2] tiles of a [Jungle]>
Must have an owned [Jungle] within [2] tiles
quote: 'My light is great. I am the path and the foothold of the people, because my eyes are of metal, while my teeth glitter with jewels.' - Popol Vuh

name: Nalanda
quote: 'If you desire ease, forsake learning. If you desire learning, forsake ease.' - Nagarjuna

name: Petra

[+1 Gold] from [{Open terrain} {Desert}] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Production, +1 Gold] from [Desert] tiles [in this city]
quote: 'Sedentary life is civilization's goal. It marks the end of its life and heralds its corruption.' - Ibn Khaldun

name: Pyramid of the Sun
uniques: [+2 Culture] from all [Culture] buildings <in this city>
quote: 'The warriors' blood flowed like water and gathered in pools.' - Mexica Account of Toxcatl

name: Pyramids
uniques: [+1 Production, +2 Gold] from [River] tiles [in this city]
quote: 'Soldiers, from the summit of these pyramids, forty centuries of history look down upon you!' - Napoleon Bonaparte

name: Sanchi Stupa

quote: 'All religions should reside everywhere, for all of them desire self-control and purity of heart!' - Ashoka

name: Terracotta Army
quote: 'After the battle many new ghosts cry.' - Du Fu

name: Weiyang Palace

Comment [Gain 5 Influence with a Land unit gift to a City-State]
Gain [5] Influence with a [Land] gift to a City-State <hidden from users>
quote: 'Heaven is lasting. Earth endures. Time has no limit. Regret goes on and on without end.' - Bai Juyi

name: Borobodur
uniques: [+1 Food] from all [Happiness] buildings <in all cities>
quote: 'The true nature of emptiness is the nature of no birth and no death. No being, no non-being.' - The Heart Sūtra

name: Brihadeeswarar Temple
quote: ' mortal ripens like corn, like corn he springs up again.' - The Katha Upanishad

name: El Escorial

quote: 'Law is nothing other than the command of the sovereign in the exercise of his power.' - Jean Bodin

name: Erdene Zuu
quote: 'O ye conquerors and your sons, O ye gurus and devas: Out of your great love, lead us along the Path.' - The Tibetan Book of the Dead

name: Forbidden City
quote: 'The past is the treasure, time is its hiding place.' - Gail Mazur

name: Grand Bazaar

quote: 'We take the golden road to Samarkand.' - James Elroy Flecker

name: Hale o Keawe
quote: 'The life of the land is perpetuated in righteousness.' - Kamehameha I

name: Havana Harbor
quote: 'In the immediate nearness of the gold, all else had been forgotten.' - Robert Louis Stevenson

name: House of Wisdom
quote: 'Do not mix the truth with falsehood or conceal the truth while you know it.' - Ayat 42, the Holy Koran

name: Machu Pikchu

Must have an owned [Mountain] within [2] tiles

name: Nan Madol
quote: 'Mother of my house, don't you stir. You shall wait for the setting of sunset glow, when gone to sleep is the surface of the seae.' - Chuuk Chant

name: Notre Dame

quote: 'The echoes of our glory and our losses, of our victories and our disasters, have always resounded under those vaults.' - André Chamson

quote: 'Sturla was often at Reykjaholt, and gave much thought to having copies made of those saga books which Snorri was writing.' - Íslendinga saga
